name: H1
headline: Connecting stakeholders across the healthcare ecosystem.
description: H1 helps connect the healthcare ecosystem by providing a global platform of every healthcare professional and healthcare organization.

raw_markdown='# [H1](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co>)
[Request a Demo](https://www.h1.co/</request-demo/>)[Login](https://www.h1.co/<https:/app.h1insights.com/login>)
# Connecting the world with the right doctors, and doctors to a world of research
The trusted source of truth for global healthcare professional (HCP), clinical, scientific, and research information for life sciences, payers, providers, and patients.
[Enterprise Solutions](https://www.h1.co/<#enterprise>)
[For Healthcare Professionals](https://www.h1.co/<#professional>)
## H1 has helped Life Sciences companies harness data to deliver results:
80
Discover that 80%+ of their HCPs were not a strategic fit
40
Increase the Medical Affairs team digital share of voice by 40%
50
Advance diversity in clinical trials with 50% Hispanic & 30% Black patients
## Creating a healthier future by making healthcare information and evidence-based medicine accessible to everyone globally
Producing insights to answer healthcare’s most critical questions.
[ Who is the right doctor to run my clinical trial and recruit diverse patients? Who is the thought leading doctor in a given therapeutic area that I should engage with? ](https://www.h1.co/<#enterprise>) [ What are the previous clinical trials done at this hospital? What is the correct address and phone number of this doctor? ](https://www.h1.co/<#enterprise>) [ Who is the rising thought leading doctor in Germany? Which doctors have the most experience prescribing certain drugs? ](https://www.h1.co/<#enterprise>)
##### Trusted by 250+ leading companies

### “Because of the advance of technology platforms, H1 being one of them, we are able to decrease the time it takes for that initial vetting of our sites. And this has proven to be an efficiency gain for us in the clinical operations world.”
Pamela Fearon, VP, Global Study Operations, BioMarin
![Smiling business man and woman looking at tablet](https://h1.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Home-One-platform.png)
## H1’s platform of every doctor globally helps drive towards our mission
H1’s platform provides the deepest view into the healthcare landscape, analyzing information on over 11 million healthcare professionals. Our software and data solutions give medical affairs, clinical trials, and commercial teams around the world an edge that can’t be replicated.
[Explore the H1 Platform](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/solutions/platform/> "H1 Platform")
## Discover our enterprise solutions
## Clinical
Accelerate your clinical trials with comprehensive data and analytics. Speed up patient recruitment, ensure diversity, and improve site selection.
[See More](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/clinical/> "Clinical")
[](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/clinical/>)
## Medical
Empower your medical affairs team with real-time HCP insights and AI-driven intelligence. Drive impactful engagements and get the right treatments to patients in need.
[See More](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/medical/> "Medical")
[](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/medical/>)
## Commercial
Connect with the right prescribers to ensure patients receive the treatments they need. Develop targeted, data-driven engagement approaches.
[See More](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/commercial/> "Commercial")
[](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/commercial/>)
## Health Plans & Digital Health
Leverage accurate provider data to power patient experiences to find the right doctor for them and power all internal systems with the same accurate provider data.
[See More](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/health-plans-digital-health/> "Payors")
[](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/health-plans-digital-health/>)
Join H1 Connect and be part of a vital movement, bridging healthcare experts with international NGOs to advance global medical missions. Our mission harnesses H1’s vast network across over 250 organizations to link doctors with key opportunities in volunteer work, emergency response, and more to make a difference globally.
Explore H1’s significant contributions to global health and how you can make a difference.
[Join now](https://www.h1.co/<https:/h1.co/solutions/h1-connect/> "H1 Connect")
![](https://h1.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Landing-hero-3.png)
## Connecting life sciences, HCPs, and more to AI-enabled data analytics and ground-breaking research that help advance medicine.
### Optimize
Data accuracy, breadth, and scale for providers worldwide.
Increase data coverage for every provider including affiliation, demographics & patient coverage
![up arrow](https://h1.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/icon-arrow-up.png)
### Save
Valuable planning time.
Save 10+ hours a week with more KOL segementation
10+
![up arrow](https://h1.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/icon-arrow-up.png)
### Increase
Diversity of PIs leading clinical trials.
Investigator diversity increased 36% over six months
![up arrow](https://h1.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/icon-arrow-up.png)
36%
### Improve
Identification of new KOLs and rising stars.
Improve identification by 275%
![up arrow](https://h1.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/icon-arrow-up.png)
275%

Our mission harnesses H1’s vast network across over 250 organizations to link doctors with key opportunities in volunteer work, emergency response, and more to make a difference globally.
Explore H1’s significant contributions to global health and how you can make a difference.

generated_description:
### H1: Bridging the Healthcare Ecosystem

**Founded**: 2017  
**Location**: New York  
**Employees**: 500  
**Batch**: Y Combinator Batch W20  
**Website**: [H1](https://www.h1.co)

---

H1 is on a mission: to connect stakeholders across the healthcare ecosystem. Picture a platform where healthcare professionals and organizations can come together globally—what H1 strives to provide. They’re not just another health-tech company; they aim to be the **trusted source of truth** for information involving healthcare professionals (HCPs), clinical research, and life sciences.

**What Makes H1 Unique?**

H1’s platform offers unparalleled insights into the global healthcare landscape—analyzing data from over **11 million healthcare professionals**. It equips life sciences companies with the tools to make informed decisions, leading to significant outcomes like enhancing diversity in clinical trials and streamlining patient recruitment. For example:
- 80%+ of healthcare professionals were identified as not being a strategic fit by clients.
- Medical Affairs teams have boosted their digital presence by **40%**.
- They facilitated the inclusion of **50% Hispanic** and **30% Black patients** in clinical trials.

**Target Audience**

Currently, H1 serves various stakeholders:
- **Life Sciences companies** looking to harness data for actionable insights.
- **Healthcare Professionals** who need reliable information to improve engagement and treatment outcomes.
- **Health Plans & Digital Health** sectors requiring precise provider data to enhance patient experiences.

### Core Offerings
1. **Clinical Solutions**: Speed up clinical trials with enhanced data and analytics for rapid patient recruitment and improved site selection.
2. **Medical Affairs**: Real-time insights and AI-driven information empower teams to engage effectively with HCPs.
3. **Commercial Strategies**: Build targeted approaches for prescribers, ensuring patients have access to essential treatments.

**The Future at H1**

H1 continually seeks to innovate, recently acquiring Ribbon Health to deepen its capabilities. They focus on using AI to transform healthcare delivery, making information and evidence-based medicine accessible worldwide. 

Pamela Fearon, VP of Global Study Operations at BioMarin, summarizes H1's impact perfectly: “Because of the advance of technology platforms, H1 being one of them, we are able to decrease the time it takes for that initial vetting of our sites. And this has proven to be an efficiency gain for us in the clinical operations world.”

**Who Trusts H1?**

Over **250 leading companies**, including giants like **Lilly**, **Sanofi**, and **AstraZeneca**, have placed their trust in H1 to enhance their healthcare strategies and operations. 

---

In conclusion, H1 is not just about connecting healthcare providers with data—it's about building a comprehensive network that ultimately aims to create a healthier future. Whether you’re looking to enhance clinical trials or improve patient care, H1 is making strides to ensure that healthcare information is at your fingertips. **Ready to see how H1 can help you?** [Request a Demo](https://www.h1.co/request-demo).
